snippet.title: Republique Episode 4: "God's Acre" - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In Episode 4: God’s Acre, players navigate Hope beyond the confines of the underground facility into a gothic graveyard. Armed with little more than sheer wit and the cover of night, players must help their companion avoid detection by the deranged groundskeeper while hacking electronic devices and solving the many puzzles of the crypt.

PRAISE FOR RÉPUBLIQUE

"Special, new, and necessary." - IGN
"A must-play experience." - Polygon
"Shaping up to be a masterpiece." - Touch Arcade (5/5)
"This is the App Store's next must-have high-end game." - CNET
"Sets a new benchmark for mobile game quality." - The Washington Post

Intense, thrilling, and topical, RÉPUBLIQUE is a stealth-action game that explores the perils of government surveillance in the Internet Age.

You receive a desperate call from Hope, a mysterious woman trapped inside an oppressive totalitarian state. By hacking into the nation's elaborate surveillance network and taking control, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes. 

ABOUT CAMOUFLAJ LLC:

Founded by former Halo 4 creative director and METAL GEAR SOLID 4 producer Ryan Payton, Camouflaj is a Seattle/Bellevue-based boutique game studio committed to developing games that are deep and broadening, sophisticated and entertaining, and imaginative and international. Comprised of industry veterans from projects including F.E.A.R., UNCHARTED, SHADOW OF MORDOR, and HALO.
